sources.title: The Bouncer | Full 2025 Hollywood Action Movie | Best New Action Movies
sources.description:
An expat on the run works as a bouncer at an upscale nightclub frequented by a notorious mob boss and his girlfriend.  When he saves the woman from being abused, the two go on the run as the vengeful boss and his army of henchmen relentlessly pursue them.  With nobody to trust and merciless killers closing in, theyâ€™ll have to use their fists, guns, and wits if they want to survive.

2025.  Stars: John Ozuna, Costas Mandylor, Rosmary Yaneva

sources.description:

metadata.Plot: The hero independently raises his little daughter and works as a security guard in a nightclub. Work is simple, enough to live. At night, he is on duty, and during the day he can communicate with the girl, because he loves her so much. Once in a bar, a terrible fight takes place, the hero has to intervene, but the consequences were sad. As a result, he finds himself in a police station, and then he is sentenced to prison.
metadata.Actors: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Sami Bouajila, Sveva Alviti
